org.treetank.service.xml.serialize
Class SAXSerializer

java.lang.Object
  org.treetank.service.xml.serialize.SAXSerializer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Callable<Void>, XMLReader
public final class SAXSerializer
extends Object
implements XMLReader

SaxSerializer

Generates SAX events from a Treetank database.

Author:
Johannes Lichtenberger, University of Konstanz
